name: Notion Meal Planning System
description: Plan your meals in NotionA template for meal planning and recipe organization. Collections and tags make it simple to keep track of your recipes. You can make a grocery list from the ingredients list.This Notion Meal System template includes: Recipe database. Easy to use shopping list. Weekly meal planner connected to recipes. A database of recipe ideas.LicensePersonal license for individual use only.Questions or feedback?Contact me: info@reemmagdi.com or iReem
features: Recipe database.; Easy to use shopping list.; Weekly meal planner connected to recipes.; A database of recipe ideas.
